content.raw:
I reverted the version bump in branch [math\_color\_math3](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/commits/eff0ee1255ce22e4f7bc0ee05cd189f2a85eeeef) and all the changes work. I suggest we postpone the dependency bump to a later pull request when it is really needed, because:

* it's not necessary
* ign-math4 hasn't been released (so building ign-common will start requiring ign-math from source)
* all released ignition packages depend on ign-math <= 3, and since currently ign-math versions are incompatible, it will be hard to use ign-common alongside other ignition packages until they're all bumped to ign-math4

Also, note the [current situation](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/27/revert-requiring-ignition-math4/diff) with ign-msgs and ign-math4.
